channel.title: Spirit Shield Bonus's wont appear ingame+Challenge option
channel.description:
Alright so i correctly changed the bonus's in the item.cfg, compiled and all, but when i check the bonus's ingame, its all 0's. I changed the bonus's of other items and they all worked fine, but spirit shields will not.
Also, Theres a challenge option, Like with, Walk here, follow, and trade, how would that be removed?
Im using a marcscape source, any ideas?
All help is appreciated.
